name: Brotzeit German Beer Bar and Restaurant - VivoCity

reviews.text: I made a reservation at this restaurant because of their advertised affordable lunch set. At the restaurant, the lunch set menu was not served by default, and we had to ask for it. Each lunch set came with a drink and had an option to add a salad or soup. Our party of 10 ordered different items, and everyone enjoyed their meal. The service was prompt, the seats were comfortable, the view was good, and the atmosphere was great. Overall, we enjoyed the lunch. Recommended.

Amazing experience at this German restaurant! The atmosphere is fantastic, with a lively and welcoming vibe. The outdoor seating is a great touch, perfect for enjoying the fresh air while dining. The food was absolutely delicious authentic German flavors and generous portions. And of course, the German beer selection was excellent, with a great variety to choose from. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a great meal and a relaxing time!

Sitting outdoors turns out to be very nice. Came for dinner just the 2 of us. Food was good, fish n chip was very juicy. Ribs was very different from the American version, less sweet and more saucy. Will bring a bigger next time to try their platter.
I was surprised at how good the salad and ribs are! One of the best ribs I have ever eaten üëçüèºüëçüèº My husband also enjoyed his order of fresh and plumb oysters ü¶™ ü¶™!!

Been here for countless of time in near 20 years that the previous review can no longer be found. This is our favorite place for good German beer, sausage and rosti! Today came for a simple lunch. Surprise they have affordable value for money weekday lunch set. Enjoyed the short lunch. Will be back again to enjoy the beer next round.
